message.content:
1. Omega-3 fatty acid was added with VSL#3.
2. The combination of omega-3 fatty acid and VSL#3 had an effect on HDL.
3. The effect on HDL was more pronounced due to the addition of omega-3 fatty acid with VSL#3.
4. The combination of omega-3 fatty acid and VSL#3 had an effect on insulin sensitivity.
5. The effect on insulin sensitivity was more pronounced due to the addition of omega-3 fatty acid with VSL#3.
6. The combination of omega-3 fatty acid and VSL#3 had an effect on hsCRP.
7. The effect on hsCRP was more pronounced due to the addition of omega-3 fatty acid with VSL#3.

messages.content:
Statement: Addition of omega-3 fatty acid with VSL#3 had more pronounced effect on HDL, insulin sensitivity and hsCRP.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
